# Accessibility

Discover resources, guidelines, and tools to help you build accessible experiences with GitHub and Primer. Explore best practices, standards, and workflows to ensure your products are usable by everyone.

![Mona](/_next/image/?url=%2Flanding-page%2Fmona.png&w=640&q=75)

## [Foundations](/accessibility/foundations/)

Policies, principles, and frameworks for building accessible experiences.

Learn more

## [Design guidance](/accessibility/design-guidance/)

Visual design principles and standards for creating inclusive user interfaces.

Learn more

## [Copilot Accessibility Principles](/accessibility/foundations/copilot-principles/)

Designing generative and agentic AI experiences that work well for everyone.

Learn more

## [Annotation Toolkit](/accessibility/tools-and-resources/annotation-toolkit/)

Design and development guidelines for Primer components.

Learn more

## [Accessibility for Primer UI](/accessibility/patterns/primer-components/)

Accessibility guidance for components and patterns in the Primer.

Learn more

## [Accessible messaging](/accessibility/patterns/accessible-notifications-and-messages/)

How to ensure updates and messages are communicated in an inclusive way.

Learn more

Need help? If you found a bug on this website, please [open a new issue](https://github.com/primer/primer-docs/issues) with as much detail as possible.
